head.title: Upscuits | Uptime biscuits
head.subtitle: short for uptime-biscuit
head.hero: A quick overview of your server's uptime served on a nice dinner-tray.

modal-about.title: What does this page mean?
content: At this page you can see the status of different servers/ apps.
Each gauge shows the uptime of last day, week, month, year and all time (these calculations are not very accurate...).
Click on the -icon to see the log of last month or open the monitored page by clicking on .

content1: Seems like you forgot one ingredient: the Monitor API keys in
no-api.content2: Did you follow all the steps in the recipe?
